CLIN 34 â€” Leiden 2024

The 34th Meeting of Computational Linguistics in The Netherlands (CLIN 34), organized by the Leiden University Centre for Linguistics (LUCL), in collaboration with the Leiden Institute of Advanced Computer Science (LIACS), and the Leiden University Centre for Digital Humanities (LUCDH), is set to be held on August 30, 2024 in the Lipsius building of Leiden University, Leiden, The Netherlands.


The following people are involved with the organization of CLIN 34:
  • Alina Karakanta, LUCL
  • Carole Tiberius, LUCL & INT
  • Gijs Wijnholds, LIACS
  • Hielke Muizelaar, LUMC
  • Jelena Prokic, LUCL & LUCDH
  • Marco Spruit, LIACS & LUMC
  • Matthijs Westera, LUCL
  • Stephan Raaijmakers, LUCL
  • Suzan Verberne, LIACS

23 May 2024

14 May 2024

Dominique Blok and Erik de Graaf from TNO will host a keynote regarding GPT-NL at CLIN 34!

20 Mar 2024

We are happy to announce Diana Maynard as a keynote speaker for CLIN 34!
